-e ---

# sein ∑ ⇔ ∃ 𓇋𓏲 𓇋𓈖 ien when one … הִנֵּה exclamation and question particle

when … were > 𓃹 hare , are
إِنْ when > even if > ʾin > ∃
إِنَّ ʾinna indeed ⇔ ani : I am ante :
إِنِّي ʾinnī or إِنَّنِي ʾinnanī ∃ I
إِنَّا ʾinnā or إِنَّنَا ʾinnanā ∃ nous

𓇑 nam nämlicher 那 أَنَّ ʾanna إنّه ʔinno

𓇋𓏲 faire ⇔ if 𓇋𓂋 wäre 𓇋𓏲 wenn when

كإنّـ (ka-ʔinn-, “as if”
لإنّـ (la-ʔinn-, “because”
𓈖 𓈖 𓏏 𓏏 | because | nun-da / now-that
𓈖 𓈖 𓏏 𓏏 | because | la'inn that لإنّـ (𓈖 𓏏 𓏏 that )
